props.title: Session connections
props.query: SELECT average(`varnish.session.connections`) FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: Requests
props.query: SELECT average(`varnish.net.requests`) FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: Session drops
props.query: SELECT average(`varnish.session.drops`) FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: Expired objects
props.query: SELECT average(`varnish.varnish.main.expiredMailed`) FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: LRU purges
props.query: SELECT average(`varnish.lru.nuked`) FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: Cache hits
props.query: SELECT average(`varnish.cache.hits`) FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: Cache misses
props.query: SELECT average(`varnish.cache.misses`) FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: Cache hits for pass
props.query: SELECT latest(`varnish.cache.passHits`) FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: Cache grace hits
props.query: SELECT average(`varnish.cache.graceHits`) FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: Cache hits for miss
props.query: SELECT average(`varnish.cache.missHits`) FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: Backend requests
props.query: SELECT average(`net.varnish.backend.requests`) FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: Backend connections
props.query: SELECT latest(`backend.connections`) FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto
